programme.title: Legend FC #6
programme.desc: Legend Fighting Championship (Legend) was the Asia-Pacific championship of Mixed Martial Arts (MMA). Legend invited national champion MMA fighters from throughout the Asia-Pacific region to compete in a freestyle tournament using interdisciplinary martial arts skills in supervised matches under a strict set of rules designed to promote athlete safety and sportsmanship. Legend was committed to promoting the sport of MMA throughout the region, to supporting and cultivating its athletes, and to providing exceptional entertainment to a broad audience.

programme.title: Goodbye Old Man
programme.desc: These incredible words written by the most senior surviving officer of the Titanic, gives us a rare and historic glimpse of the final moments of the senior men that night. It may surprise you to hear just how calm these men really were.

programme.title: Memories from the Big Movie Part 2
programme.desc: Ken refers to it simply as the “Big Movie” and without question, it changed his life. In part 2 of this two-part series, Ken describes his feelings walking the decks at Foxs Baja Studios and what it was like working with his friend James Cameron.

programme.title: Going to Titanic - Richie Kohler
programme.desc: Underwater explorer, Richie Kohler wrote a check for $100,000, sent it to Russia and bought himself and his wife a seat on the Mir Submersible. He was going on the greatest dive of his life to explore the world’s most famous shipwreck.

programme.title: Titanic Movie Memorabilia
programme.desc: One of the most desired categories of collectibles for Titanic enthusiasts is the growing movie memorabilia market – From the Nazi German Titanic movie in 1943 to James Cameron’s 1997 blockbuster - it’s all out there.

programme.title: The Olympic Class Ships
programme.desc: Titanic Author, Mark Chirnside tells us that White Star spent more money on the three Olympic class ships then the entire value of their fleet in 1908. Were the Olympic Class ships the peak of shipbuilding in the early 1900’s?

programme.title: Money Troubles
programme.desc: People traveling in 1912 needed to take a lot of cash along on their journey. Unlike today, Europe and America were both cash societies and often that became a problem.

programme.title: Trapped in a Tunnel
programme.desc: Senan Molony digs into the Titanic archives and finds a remarkable story of a greaser - trapped and then rescued from one of the most obscure and forgotten parts of the ship.

programme.title: The New Heroic Picture of Thomas Andrews
programme.desc: Every film and every documentary show Thomas Andrews at the end in the first-class smoking room in front of the fireplace staring up at a painting. Kent Layton and his co-authors have uncovered sources that give us a very different account of Mr....

programme.title: Lightoller and Dunkirk
programme.desc: It turns out Titanic was only Act I for Charles Lightoller. Twenty-eight years after Titanic, he was at the helm of his own boat navigating through enemy fire while rescuing British troops from Dunkirk. He was a true British hero!

programme.title: Masabumi Hosono
programme.desc: The only Japanese passenger on Titanic helped save lives, but was ostracized back in his home country for the rest of his life. There’s been many published accounts about Hosono, but now Robert Bracken gives us the real story.

programme.title: Titanic's Morse Lamps
programme.desc: Before radio, ships had to communicate with each other visually. During the day they used hand flags and at night it was through morse lamps. Bill Sauder explains Titanic’s Lamps: where they were located and how they were used.

programme.title: Shipwreck Diving
programme.desc: With the recent discovery of the German submarine in the North Sea, we decided to go into the archives and take another look at Richie Kohler’s Shipwreck Diving. In this remarkable episode, Richie tells of his own extraordinary discovery of a World...

programme.title: Fixing The Wireless
programme.desc: If Jack Phillips had followed the rules, the wireless set would have still been broken the night the Titanic hit the iceberg and the Carpathia may never have received the distress call in time. Instead, Jack took initiative and fixed it himself and...

programme.title: Britannic Dive Part 2
programme.desc: For underwater explorers, the 400-foot dive to Britannic is at the apex of technical diving. Richie Kohler relates his harrowing life and death experience on Britannic in 2009.

programme.title: The Mirage Theory
programme.desc: Parks Stephenson gives us a clear and thorough explanation of the Mirage Theory. Does this theory really explain why Titanic hit the iceberg?

programme.title: Did the Lights Stay On?
programme.desc: Parks Stephenson introduces an eyewitness account who says that the lights stayed on in the aft part of Titanic after she broke! Parks also explains how this could have happened.

programme.title: Titanic's Most Refined Features
programme.desc: Titanic Historian Bill Sauder continues his look at Titanic’s remarkable First Class Lounge. In this episode, Sauder reveals the architectural and decorative point of view and shows why the room was a showcase onboard the ship.

programme.title: Please No Smoking But If You Must
programme.desc: In 1912 people knew that smoking was bad for your health. Titanic had designated nonsmoking areas around the ship but if you needed to light-up, the smoking lounges were waiting. Bill Sauder tells us there was more than just smoking going on inside.

programme.title: The Anchor Crane Mystery - Ken Marschall
programme.desc: When the first images of Titanic came back in 1985, everyone noticed how the bow anchor crane was turned to a very unusual position; even considering the crash into the ocean floor. Jim Cameron’s got one theory about what happened and Ken Marschall’s...

programme.title: How Large was Titanic?
programme.desc: Why can’t we get the numbers right after all these years? Just how big was Titanic? Bill Sauder finally sets the record straight and answers the question - Was she the largest ship in the world?

programme.title: An Experience of A Lifetime Diving Titanic
programme.desc: He was the first school teacher to dive Titanic, not once - but twice. In this very candid account, Titanic channel host Charles Haas tells us how nerves almost kept him from going. In the end, his journey to his beloved Titanic proved to be an exciting...

programme.title: The Padded Room
programme.desc: Hidden away in Titanic’s isolation hospital was a 5x6 room padded completely from top to bottom with canvas cushions. White Star didn’t talk much about the room, but Bill Sauder will tell you how it was used.

programme.title: Road to One Water Race 2024 (Fr)
programme.desc: La One Water Race est une course dendurance basée sur la course à pied, la natation et la course dorientation. 7 équipes mixtes de 4 athlètes doivent traverser larchipel de Stockholm-Suède du Nord au Sud dans une course non-stop de 250 km dont 200 km de course à pied et 50 km de natation. Ils doivent gérer pleinement leur navigation y compris dans lobscurité. Road to One Water Race nous fait découvrir les athlètes et les enjeux de cette épreuve complètement folle.

programme.title: Vanora ENGADINWIND 2024
programme.desc: The Vanora ENGADINWIND 2024 gathers once again the world class of Windsurfer and Wingfoiler competing at the Lake Silvaplana in the Engadine, Switzerland. The event has developed into the worlds most important and largest foil event. Furthermore, it is the place to be for the U23 World Championships in the iQ FOiL windsurfing category. Also, 150 windsurfers, kite-surfers and wingfoilers from 35 different nations honor tradition and take part in the 47th edition of the Engadin Surf & Kite marathon on Lake Silvaplana.Le Vanora ENGADINWIND 2024 rassemble une fois de plus la classe mondiale des Windsurfer et Wingfoiler concourant au lac Silvaplana en Engadine, en Suisse.

programme.title: Vendée Globe 2024 - Mag #8 (Eng)
programme.desc: Its the passage of Cape Horn for the first competitors with only 9 minutes and 30 minutes between the two leaders. Loïc Peyron gives us his analysis of the race and we spend a Christmas afternoon with Nicolas Lunvens family.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Rd1 Baqueira Beret Spain
programme.desc: The 2023 Freeride World Tour kicks off in January in its 16th season – as usual with the best freeriders all over the globe! The first stop of the tour takes place in Baqueira Beret who plays again host, following the success of last year’s inaugural event at this epic venue. Consistent snowfall and varied terrain make this world-class resort an ideal test for freeride fanatics.The judging criteria at the Freeride World Tour are: Difficulty of Line, Control, Fluidity, Jumps & Technique.

programme.title: La Grande Odyssée 2022
programme.desc: La Grande Odyssée Savoie Mont Blanc est, depuis sa première édition en janvier 2005, l’événement annuel du chien de traîneau en Europe. C’est la course à étapes la plus exigeante dans un décor alpin unique au monde. Découvrez un plateau sportif d’exception avec 68 mushers et leurs 600 chiens-athlètes venant de grandes nations du mushing européen (France, Suède, Suisse, Espagne, Allemagne, Italie et Pologne). Ce sont plus de 50 000 spectateurs qui vivent chaque année une expérience unique, au coeur de 20 stations, villes et villages, de Savoie Mont Blanc en habits de fête pour l’occasion, en assistant à La Grande Odyssée Savoie Mont Blanc.La Grande Odyssee Savoie Mont Blanc is since it’s first edition in January 2005, the annual event of the dog sled race in Europe. It is the most demanding stage race in a unique alpine setting in the world. Each year it brings together more than 60 mushers and their 600 dogs, from all over Europe, in the stunning landscapes of Savoie Mont Blanc. It is more than 50 000 spectators who live every year a unique experience, in 20 stations decorated for the occasion, by attending La Grande Odyssee Savoie Mont Blanc.

programme.title: Pierra Menta 2024 #3
programme.desc: La Pierra Menta est devenue au fil des 37 éditions, la compétition de ski-alpinisme de référence, un passage obligé pour l’élite de la discipline. Elle rassemble tous les ans plus de 200 cordées de 2 skieurs. Tour de force au sommet du grand mont! les équipes masculines et féminines françaises confortent leur première place au classement général de la Pierra Menta au cœur dune troisième étape clé pour la victoire finale

programme.title: Running the Loowit Trail on Mt St Helens
programme.desc: The Loowit Trail circumnavigates Mount St. Helens, past old-growth forests, waterfalls, meadows, and the leftovers of the volcanos 1980 eruption. We ran the roughly 30 mile trail, starting from Climbers Bivouac Campground. (English version with French and Italian subtitles)

programme.title: Pierra Menta 2025 #1
programme.desc: Comme si gravir 2.250 m de dénivelé dans les montagnes du Beaufortain en ski alpinisme ne suffisait pas, les coureurs engagés sur cette 39e Pierra Menta, ont dû performer malgré des conditions météo capricieuses. Pluie, neige et brouillard se sont invités sur la 1ère des 4 étapes mais n’ont pas freiné l’enthousiasme des 430 engagés au départ d’Arêches Beaufort au niveau du plateau des Pauses.

programme.title: Nightmare Climbs - Stentaria (Eng)
programme.desc: Our two heroes Emiliano Cantagallo and Patrick Martini go through the door of hell climbing 1011 meters on La Stentaria with an average gradient of 19 which gets worse until reaching the maximum of 32 before finally climbing the hill. We are in Friuli - on the opposite side of the Zoncolan up the pass of the saddle. Seeing is believing......

programme.title: Expedition Antarctica of extreme sports woman Caro North
programme.desc: Iceclimbing, ski mountaineering and sailing the open water for days through the infamous Drake Passage: The 28 years old extreme sports woman Caro North made her way to the very South of our continent for a four weeks expedition – accompanied by an eight-member crew. Antarctica turned out to be a paradise for extreme sports: deserted landscapes and snow-capped mountains against a surreal backdrop of ice and sea were waiting to be discovered.

programme.title: Alone And Without A Guide On Mexico's Third Highest Mountain-Iztaccihuatl (Eng)
programme.desc: Being alone and without a guide in a summit attempt for the third highest mountain in Mexico was a dream. The climb is amazing. The ridge to Iztaccihuatls summit feels endless, but the views of the surrounding valleys and Popocatepetl make the effort worth it.

programme.title: 5 Torri Winter Hike
programme.desc: We snow shoe in the heart of the Dolomites, above Cortina, to the enchanted 5 Torri and stop at the Rifuggio Scoiattolo for refreshments. Nous partons en raquettes au cœur des Dolomites, au-dessus de Cortina, jusquaux magnifiques "5 Torri" et nous nous arrêtons au Rifuggio Scoiattolo pour nous rafraîchir.

programme.title: Norvan Falls
programme.desc: A group of us pay a visit to one of our favourite local waterfalls, Norvan Falls in North Vancouver, BC. Youll also get a look at how the falls look when frozen mid-winter.

programme.title: Ungrounded Episode 1 - Caroline Gleich
programme.desc: Caroline Gleich, a world class ski mountaineer, summited Mt. Everest last spring as part of her #ClimbForEquality campaign to raise awareness for gender equality. In Episode 1, Gleich overcomes her own struggle after tearing her ACL to rise to the top for all women. (English version with French, Italian, German and Spanish subtitles available)

programme.title: Nendaz FWT Challenger 2025
programme.desc: This year, Nendaz Freeride returns to the FWT Challenger, the final stage of the legendary Freeride World Tour, confirming its place among the best freeride competitions. The faces of Mont-Gond offer athletes an infinite number of lines and ideal conditions in which to practice their art. Thats why it attracts so many international freeriders in search of thrills and spills.

programme.title: Skiing China, Exploring Altai Mountains
programme.desc: A quartet of champion skiers and snowboarders from Australia and the USA visit the unexplored Altai Frontier in China, now believed to be the place where skiing first developed, more than 10,000 years ago. They encounter the ancient culture of the region and explore the spectacular local slopes, using their own hi-tech equipment as well as the traditional skis manufactured by local craftsmen using age-old practices. The four visitors, Scott Kneller, Jari Hiatt, Halina Boyd and Harry Kearney, all of whom have world-beating careers in snowboarding, skiing and ski mountaineering, discover new challenges and new frontiers in China’s remote north-western province.

programme.title: Pierra Menta 2025 #4
programme.desc: Axelle Gachet-Mollaret et Lorna Bonnel remportent cette 39e édition de la Pierra Menta avec classe. Chez les hommes, Xavier Gachet etWilliam Bon Mardion simposent et réalisent un doublé historique 10 jours après leur titre de champion du monde par équipe

programme.title: The First Second - Vivian Bruchez
programme.desc: Ses yeux ne quittent jamais la montagne… Du premier coup d’oeil sur une face à la vision exigeante qui englobera tout, Vivian Bruchez avance comme un explorateur. Sa pratique de la pente raide est une marche vers l’inconnu, aussi enthousiaste que méthodique , une quête minutieuse du moindre détail, un parcours vers l‘accord avec lui-même.Vivian Bruchez - The Steep search. His eyes never leave the mountain ... From the first glance at a demanding vision that will encompass everything, Vivian Bruchez moves forward like an explorer. His practice of the steep slope is a march towards the unknown, as enthusiastic as it is methodical, a meticulous quest for the smallest detail, a journey towards agreement with himself.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 Ep4 Fieberbrunn, Austria
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour 2023 has its fourth stop in Fieberbrunn, Austria - as always with the best freeriders from all over the world! The first part of the FWT finals takes place in Fieberbrunn, where the athletes have to conquer the imposing Wildseeloder. This mountain is a real test of endurance even for the most experienced pros, and the athletes will certainly have to give it all.

programme.title: World Rookie Freeski Finals 2024
programme.desc: The World Rookie Tour is excited that the Freeski Finals are held in the magnificent Ursus Snowpark at Madonna di Campiglio. This event shows the world’s most talented young freeski athletes as they compete in one of the most celebrated snowparks in Europe.This exclusive opportunity brings the excitement and competitive spirit of one of the most anticipated events in youth action sports directly to athletes, fans and viewers. Fans from across the globe have the opportunity to witness the future of freeskiing unfold in real-time.

programme.title: Dark Peak Fell Runners
programme.desc: The Dark Peak Fell Runners base themselves in Sheffield, but their playground is the Peak District National Park where they weave tracks through the fields, peat bogs and rocky outcrops to create a tapestry of eccentricity, endeavour and endurance. As one of the biggest pure fell running clubs in the UK, the ‘Dark Peak Fell Runners’ captures the personality, quirks and successes of the club and its members. Shot throughout the course of a year, the film follows in their footsteps to reveal their well-trodden Peak District running routes including the club’s flagship race, the Edale Skyline. (Special Thanks to Pertex)

programme.title: Cobia 218 DC – Miami Boat Show 2024
programme.desc: Bill Hackett is aboard the Cobia 218 Dual Console. Thanks to its versatility, this family-friendly boat is perfect for both fishing and relaxing.

programme.title: Rendez-V Marine - 2023 (Eng)
programme.desc: Discover the sixteenth edition of the Rendez-V Marine, an event organized by V Marine and dedicated to the owners and enthusiasts of Azimut Yachts and Pirelli Speedboats.

programme.title: Genova Boat Show 2022 - Inflatable boats
programme.desc: Bacci Del Buono is at the Genova Boat Show to present you some of the news inflatable boats at the event. Amongst them: Tecnorib P50, Ranieri International Cayman 45 Cruiser, Zar Formenti 95 Sport Luxury and Marco R26.

programme.title: Roxtec (Eng)
programme.desc: The Boat Show takes you behind the scenes of a very successful company. We are talking about Roxtec, world leader in sealing systems for pipe and cable passages.

programme.title: Salerno Boat Show - 2021
programme.desc: Our Maria Elisa Altese takes you to Marina DArechi, a modern strategic port just a few miles from the Amalfi Coast. This is where the fifth edition of the Salerno Boat Show takes place, an appointment that over the years has become a reference point for boat enthusiasts in central and southern Italy.

programme.title: How to - Improve your sailing performance
programme.desc: Bacci Del Buono shows all the functionality of the Raymarine Axiom 2 Pro and explains how to improve sailing performance with polar poles.

programme.title: Raymarine - YachtSense Ecosystem
programme.desc: Hop on the FIM Regina 470 to test Raymarine’s full optional onboard electronics.

programme.title: Cantiere del Pardo – 50th anniversary
programme.desc: Celebrate 50 years of history of Cantiere del Pardo with Antonio Vettese and The Boat Show.

programme.title: Monaco Yacht Show - 2022
programme.desc: Welcome to Montecarlo for this new edition of the Monaco Yacht Show 2022. Let’s ear from some of the most important names in the nautical world.

programme.title: Elica Yachts (Eng)
programme.desc: Maria Elisa Altese takes you to meet Elica Yachts, a company that deals with buying and selling of second-hand yachts up to 40 metres. Experience, competence and professionalism at your disposal.

programme.title: Palm Beach International Boat Show 2024 – Highlights
programme.desc: Experience the boating season at the 2024 Palm Beach International Boat Show, featuring yachts and accessories in every category in the heart of West Palm Beach. Dont miss the perfect mix of luxury, fun and world-class entertainment.

programme.title: All about Brunswick - MIBS 2023

programme.title: Riviera Belize 66 Daybridge - Built for cruising
programme.desc: Sam Orani invites you on board the Riviera Belize 66 Daybridge, on show at the Fort Lauderdale International. This is a very social boat, ideal for cruising.

programme.title: 500 Offshore – A striking tender
programme.desc: Maurizio Bulleri is on board the 500 Offshore, a tender inspired by the iconic Fiat 500.

programme.title: How to - Anchor with Raymarine
programme.desc: Welcome to another appointment with "How to". In this episode Bacci Del Buono explains how to correctly set the alarm for anchoring.

programme.title: Yanmar Venmar Lido 32 - Sustainable Navigation
programme.desc: Follow Maurizio Bulleri testing the future of green mobility with the Venmar Lido 32, the latest generation Yanmar Diesel powered boat, powered by HVO, 100 organic Hydrotreated Vegetable Oil.

programme.title: Genova Boat Show 2022 - Motor
programme.desc: Maurizio Bulleri takes you on board the new motor boats present at the Genova International Boat Show 2022. Discover the novelties by Absolute, Azimut, Ferretti Yachts, Sunseeker and many others.

programme.title: FTP Industrial
programme.desc: FTP Industrial is a society that has been constructing marine engines for over 150 years. Guglielmo Tummarello, Head of Product Portfolio, Marketing and Sales Marine of FPT INDUSTRIAL talks about it.

programme.title: Monaco Energy Boat Challenge - 2023
programme.desc: Entering its tenth edition, the Monaco Energy Boat Challenge brings together the best green technologies for the nautical industry every year.

programme.title: MTI 440X FLIBS 2024 (Eng)
programme.desc: Bill Hackett is at the Fort Lauderdale Boat Show, aboard the MTI 440X, the largest outboard catamaran in the range. Designed to tackle more challenging seas, it offers a new 8-person layout and powerful performance, inheriting the success of the 340X and 390X models.

programme.title: Beauty and art
programme.desc: The Boat Show welcomes you to Venice, a magical place for those who love beauty and art. Imagine navigating its water: what does the boat of your dreams look like? Could it be like this GV 30 Thunder by Vizianello? This water-limousines or top-of-the-range tender is elegant, practical and built skillfully, sized to resist the wave motion generated by the other boats that navigate this lagoon city.

programme.desc: After many months of paperwork to obtain visas and permits, the team successfully enters the not-often visited country of Myanmar. Formerly known as Burma, the country doesn’t host foreign travelers often and they are the 2nd group to cross the country...

Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina
programme.desc: S1:E12 For almost 20 years, the media portrayed Jennifer Aniston as a heartbroken woman who would never be happy until she had kids. That couldn’t be further from the truth. Our team uncovered details that will prove Brad and Jennifer were the perfect Hollywood couple everybody adored, until Brad suddenly left Jen for Angelina Jolie. This story is so much bigger than Brangelina.

programme.title: Anna Faris vs. Chris Pratt
programme.desc: S1:E6 If Chris Pratt didn’t have an affair with Jennifer Lawrence, why did he file for divorce From Anna Faris? Chris Pratt and Anna Faris were the famous, ideal couple the world couldn’t get enough of. But when Chris Pratt skyrocketed into superstardom, Anna felt more and more insecure. Then, rumors of Chris having an affair with co-star Jennifer Lawrence emerged. Even though they both deny having an affair, Chris and Annas sudden divorce, fallout of their personal lives, and the health of their son caused a media frenzy that our team got to the bottom of.

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. The whole world watched as Britney went from being the media’s pop princess to spiralling in a very public meltdown, but what did Justin have to do with it? Our team uncovered the truth behind what really happened, and what Justin’s iconic Cry Me a River video has to do with Britney’s freedom.

programme.title: Katy Perry vs. Russell Brand
programme.desc: S1:E7 Katy Perry is no stranger to toxic relationships. She finally thought she landed the perfect one with bad boy comedian Russell Brand, only for him to divorce her through text message right in the middle of her world tour 2 years later. Our team uncovered the full story of the turbulent aftermath and the journey she went on to become a strong, authentic person who was finally able to fully embrace a healthy relationship.

programme.title: Kim Kardashian & Pete Davidson Vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E14 The whole world witnessed Kim and Kanyes marriage fall apart. At first it seemed like they were supporting each other through their divorce, but suddenly Kanye started to publicly attack Kim, accusing her of exploiting and kidnapping their children. What happened? Our team did some digging and traced it all back to Kims performance on SNL. Everyone assumes Kanye’s attacks are because of Pete Davidson, but we uncovered the real reason Kanye turned against Kim Kardashian.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs

programme.title: Keys To Financial Freedom
programme.desc: Only 23 of Americans have saved over $50,000 for their retirement. How do you know when you are ready to retire? Ready financially ready emotionally? Retiring too early can leave you strapped financially or leave you feeling unfulfilled. Retiring without a plan in place for how your will utilize the funds you have or how to minimize your tax exposure can dramatically limit how far your funds will last.

programme.title: LinkedIn is Ruining your Career & Do Woke Companies Go Broke
programme.desc: LinkedIn is one of the strangest social media platforms in existence. Where else can you find people bragging about working unpaid overtime and writing appreciation posts to the companies that just laid them off? It’s a really weird website… But is it hurting your career? LinkedIn is a strange place where people talk at length about how great they are at their job to look enticing to potential future employers. In 2006 when the company was founded it was a strange concept, but it has worked for LinkedIn which is now the ninth largest social media platform in the world. It had more monthly users than twitter before both sites were acquired. Elon Musk and a team of investors purchased twitter for forty four BILLION dollars in October twenty-twenty-two, a record sum for a social media company being taken private. Musk’s controversial purchase beat LinkedIn’s record from 2016 when it was taken private by Microsoft from twenty-six point two billion dollars. Musk is often criticized for overpaying for twitter when LinkedIn is the comparison. At the time of acquisition LinkedIn had slightly more monthly users than Twitter but it also had something that the blue bird just couldn’t match. Every time you log into LinkedIn you are giving Microsoft something unmatched by every other social network in existence, value. If you are using a service for free YOU are the product and LinkedIn users are the most valuable product of them all. LinkedIn generated revenues of thirteen point eight billion dollars in 2022 which is two and a half times higher than twitters highest year of revenue ever. We don’t have public figures on it now since it is a private company but most analyst expect that twitters revenues are down since Musk’s acquisition. The average LinkedIn user is worth seventy six times more than the average reddit user, thirty five times more than the average Pinterest user, four times as much as the average YouTube viewer and three times as much as the average Facebook user. programme.title: Cape Horn
programme.desc: In 2009 three windsurfers and a film crew began sailing around the infamous Cape Horn. They wanted to capture the myth of Cape Horn and better understand the sailors and buccaneers of the old days, surrounding the southernmost tip of South America without engines or any kind of modern navigation system. They start from the Pacific coast in Chile, heading south towards the lakes of Patagonia and eventually coming to the end of the world in the Land of Fire.

programme.title: Machine Wizardry
programme.desc: Even super heroes need a little help every once in a while, our sewing machine comes to the rescue with today's projects. Teacher Ellen Miller has a little bobbin magic as she introduces us to Sashiko, a couture technique that adds so many dimensions to your sewing. Then practice a little machine wizardry with Joanne Banko. Even the most basic machine includes super sewing stitches that can make your sewing more professional. Learn how easy it is to get super results using stretch stitches, overcast, basting, and blind hem and even buttonhole stitches for super results.

programme.title: The Late Teens - Everything Had Changed
programme.desc: As the war ended, people dressed up more. Coleen Swettman uses computerized embroidery technology to create free-standing lace for accessories, collars, cuffs and trim. Women wore bloomers for sports like swimming, tennis, basketball and bowling. Tina Givens shows how to update the original bloomers to wear today. Lynn Lunoe shows how to create charming doll fashions faster than ever.

programme.title: Wrap It
programme.desc: Wrap bracelets and wire wrapping are just two ways to get wrapped up in beads. Katie shows how to embellish flip flops, Barb Switzer creates wire wrapped chandelier earrings, Erin Siegel demonstrates a leather wrap bracelet, and last featured are stacking wired bracelets; wrap it today, wear it tonight and love it every day.

programme.title: Episode 10: Make Your Own Embellishments
programme.desc: Use cutting tools, stamps, pens and markers to make customized embellishments. Julie shows how to embellish paper flowers with watercolor markers for her page layout. Next, Jenn Mason demonstrates how to make fabric tape. Then, Joe Rotella uses paper collage with scraps to cover a wooden tea box. Last, Julie uses several techniques to embellish a paper tag.

programme.title: Episode 4: Your Techniques
programme.desc: Add a different tool, a new surface, or just make a subtle change to shape up your techniques. First, host Julie Fei Fan Balzer creates a handmade journal cover using watercolor powders. Next, Micah Goguen shares a technique for creating frosted vintage botanicals. Then, Sandy McTier has a few tricks for decorative painting with her festive pumpkins project. Last is a color study -- the color grey.

Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: The Egg
programme.desc: Gummy wakes up with a mysterious egg in his bedroom – and, over Harry’s objections, becomes convinced that it’s ‘Junior’, a future soccer star!

programme.title: Pizza Mania
programme.desc: Dunky has made pizza and gives one slice to each of them. Cat likes the pizza so much that he do not want to share the balance pizza with Keet.

programme.title: Trick or Creep
programme.desc: Its Halloween and the Creepy Candy concoct a plan to trick poor Mr. Finkle. Their spooky prank has everyone at the library creeped out. Will Mr. Finkle discover it was them? Will he get even? Watch to find out!

programme.title: Aprils Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: The Star Talers
programme.desc: In the cold winter, the kindhearted girl, GoGo, meets several people who feel sorry for her on her way home. A fairy queen appears in front of a GoGGo that distributes all her clothes and bread and shakes in the cold.

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: CHAPPAR PHAD KE!
programme.desc: Customers are complaining about the taste of the tea. Chai raja cant concentrate in preparation as the Radio is going on and off due to weak signal. Chai Raja orders Sundar to climb the roof of the tea stall and hold the radio for better signal. This is the golden opportunity for Basha, with Sundar on the roof; there is no one to guard the tea. That is not it. Basha tries everything possible to make the radio signals go crazy thereby making Chai Raja go crazier and Sundar running for his dear life!

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: LEMONAIDING THE ENEMY
programme.desc: Feeling sorry for Mark, the Ninjas throw him a bone. This almost backfires, however, when he unexpectedly returns accompanied by Durian and a gang of chumplings.

programme.title: Just A Days Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don’s life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit’s end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can’t imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: Froggy Friends
programme.desc: The frogs from the well are good friends of Keet so when ever Cat tries to enter the house to steal something from the kitchen they will croak and Keet.

programme.title: A Fright Night
programme.desc: It is late night movie day and Don and Colonel are watching Dracula. Don is shell scared and the rat trio has a superb idea. Now with Charly, Marly and Larry trying all sorts of pranks, it is utter fright night for Don and Colonel. But even the rats come to fear Dracula… How???

programme.title: TREE TROUBLE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to help with heavy gardening, much to Xia’s dismay. Negu sends a Giant Beaver Mutant to eat the Yan’s world trees, threatening its very survival. Pai has to master cooking Slippery Jade Noodles to get the Mutant to eat something besides trees.

programme.title: Super Fun Color Run
programme.desc: Sneevil tries to sabotage the Smighties annual Colour Festival by cementing the competing Smighties with his newest contraption. The Super Six must get colorfully creative to stop him.

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: Super Fireworks Show
programme.desc: Nardy celebrates the Light Region Light Show with edible fireworks, while Sneevil makes a volcano erupt with flowing lava, threatening all of the Smighties. Its up to the Super Six to use their powers and save the day.

programme.title: Kiwi, flightless birds
programme.desc: When the gods were still ruling the world, when trees and flowers on the ground began to wither due to insects, the goddess WI-Go asks Kiwi to do the hard work of catching insects, and she readily accepts the GoGo.

programme.title: A Smelly Taco Surprise
programme.desc: Nardy makes a Taco Surprise which gives Zap a bad case of smelly gas. Will the embarrassed Smighty help when Sneevil rides into Smightyland in his gigantic Bowling Boulder Ball?

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: Frequent Flyer
programme.desc: Bags packed, Don and Colonel are all set to fly. Little do they know who are hiding amidst their ironed shirts. Charly Marly and Lary continue to steal food, messing things up for Don and Colonel. Even up in the air, the chaotic scene doesn’t change. To add on to this, guess who is on the next seat? Ballu!!!

programme.title: Melody's Powerful Music
programme.desc: Sneevil creates a powerful magnet to draw an iron asteroid towards Smightyland. Melody must summon her power of rock to blast the asteroid out of the sky before its too late.

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: The Lightning Strikes
programme.desc: Its raining heavily and the three are nicely tucked in the sofa and watching a tv show as the tv goes out.

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: A Bumpy Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: Let Me Fly
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: “Cuppa” Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: Bobby's Day Out
programme.desc: The loose motion has caught on to Cat, when he agrees to babysit his neighboring cat Katreena’s neice for the afternoon.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlie’s
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala head off to a scary Halloween costume party – but the winner of the ‘Best Costume’ prize.... isn’t wearing a costume, and is actually a real monster!

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: Friends or Foes
programme.desc: Its friendship day and Dunky makes both Keet and Cat share friendship bands with each other and makes them promise to maintain friendship for a day at least.

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: The Feast
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting him. GrandPA tells Dunky in the morning to have a very tasty and mouth watering fish curry prepared for them.

programme.title: Lend A Helping Stare
programme.desc: Odessa gets into a staring contest with a Stareoffolous and needs to ask for help...but refuses to. You can do it, but sometimes you need to think about what help you need to get to the next step and ask for that help.

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: King couch potato
programme.desc: The twins travel to a medieval castle where they meet a king who is too comfortable and lazy to ever leave home.

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: Rainy Blues
programme.desc: Relentless rain and a hot cup of black tea, what more could Don ask for. Raindrops at home? As Don and Colonel take different measures to seal the cracks. Cement, tarpaulin sheets and umbrellas! The trio make sure that it isn’t an easy task.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: Scared
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala watch a scary late-show on TV – and all wind up too scared to go to bed, their imaginations soon running wild...

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Christmas
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house with a Christmas tree, a small stable and stars, while Dunky is making a nice Christmas cake for the day.

programme.title: The Grasshopper and the Ant
programme.desc: The long, freezing winter has arrived for both the Ants, who worked hard from Spring to Autumn, and the Grasshopper, who sang and played all along.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: Mister Perfect
programme.desc: Nora is so impressed with Eddie’s philanthropic music concert, Fred uses Friday to trick Eddie into letting him headline the show.

programme.title: Samir and the Sky Lamp
programme.desc: Samir plans to launch a lantern into the sky and measure how far it rises but his experiment is cut short by the Grand Vizier. Mild mannered Samir does not argue with authority and obeys the Grand Viziers orders but Jamillah and Aladdin see the injustice of the situation and convince Samir that he should go ahead with his experiment. Unfortunately taking their advice gets Samir arrested. Jamillah, Aladdin and Genie fly Samirs lamp for him and Samir, spurred on by Jamillah and Aladdins example states his case to the Sultan. Samir is delighted when his bravery is rewarded and the Sultan releases him, it turns out the Sultan is also a man of science and is delighted with Samirs experiment, much to the Grand Viziers annoyance.

programme.title: Kidnap Mayhem
programme.desc: One night a group of Bandits come to GrandPAs house to kidnap him. In a scheme of confusions the bandits manage the kidnap and arrive at a lonely warehouse on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: A Rodent Fix
programme.desc: Don has a new and yummy kitchen garden. And a new thief too! For the first time, don and the rats join hands to catch the unwanted intruder. And it is indeed a veggie mess all around.

programme.title: Flower Power
programme.desc: Zap doubts that Leila is tough enough, but she proves you dont mess with her when Sneevil vacuums up Smightyland and the Smighties.

programme.title: A Lucky Accident
programme.desc: Maple accidentally breaks Pancake’s favorite toy, and he blows up at her. Pancake gains a different perspective about his reaction when, in the Zooniverse, he accidentally breaks a gigantic weather making machine, creating an assortment of weird weather conditions that threaten the Zooniverse. Be slow to lay blame when accidents happen; and resilient in solving the problems when they do.

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Tommy’s Got Talent
programme.desc: Charlie and the twins are practising for Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest. Deedee isn’t contesting as she didn’t get any time to practice. The twins have a tough time dancing in step with Uncle Charlie’s drum beat. Deedee tries to help them with a remembering spell, but Nino points out that it wouldn’t be fair to use magic in a contest. So Deedee and Nino walk along wishing the twins are able to perfect their act in time. Mewmew si struggling with a juggling act, so Deedee tries to help by conjuring a catching spell, but Nino reminds her it’s wrong just in time. Luciano haughtily sings as he walks. But Deedee and Nino hear an even more beautiful tune emanating from Tommy Prickles house. But Tommy is not too confident to sing in the presence of others. So Deedee comes up with a non-magic way to help. Happy at what Deedee suggests, Tommy decides to enroll. The fabulous prize is Tiggy’s very own specially made jelly. The winner is decided by who gets the highest ovation as measured on the clap-o-meter. Charlie and the twins perform outstandingly, so does Mewmew the juggling rabbit, Luciano’s opera all of whom get loud ovations. Finally it is Tommy prickles turn, but he isn’t able to keep his eyes closed like Deedee suggested him to, making his singing come to an abrupt stop. Deedee asks the audience if they could close their eyes to help Tommy sing. That was all Tommy needed to sing so very melodiously. The clap-o-meter does a full spin and points to the highest score ever. Tommy is declared the winner of Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest, that too without magic a wee bit.

programme.title: Weather Boy
programme.desc: Rain keeps Fred and his buddies stuck inside, until Friday secretly clears the rain clouds, earning Fred the name, “Weather boy.” Brains warns Fred never to try that again, though Nora begs him to make her beach party have a sunny day. Fred’s tinkering attracts a strange gas cloud, which they must freeze, causing snow on the beach.

programme.title: Super Thomas
programme.desc: Fred gives Thomas the chance to feel like his idol, a comic book hero in a flying metal suit.

programme.title: MONDO YAWN
programme.desc: Maestro Woof is having trouble sleeping. The Guardians try to cure his insomnia. The other Elders make a sleeping tonic, but Pai mistakes it for lemonade and drinks it. Xia and April discover a Mutant Raccoon from Negu is keeping Maestro Woof awake. Pai “sleep-fights” the raccoon brilliantly, but can’t do it when he’s awake. With the Elders’ help, the Guardians defeat the raccoon. Worn out, Maestro Woof falls asleep.

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: Fred’s Close Shave
programme.desc: Fred wishes he could look older, so Nora would like him as much as her pop star crush “Romeo Romero.” When he learns about the hair growth bugs that made Brains grow a beard-- he purposely uses them on himself. Now, whenever Friday shaves it off their beards, they grow back longer!

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: Captain Blackbeard – Little Mermaid Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of “The Little Mermaid” by Hans Christian Andersen, having been called out by a Turtle-Doctor, who is attending to NEPTUNE, the king of the seas. The LITTLE MERMAID, the monarch’s youngest daughter, has mysteriously disappeared. NEPTUNE is very sad and his health is in danger. SANDRA and FO will carry out an in-depth investigation, discovering that everything forms part of a plan by the SEA WITCH. The evil villain of the ocean depths has summoned up the perfidious monsters of the sea, in order to gain power over all the oceans.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: I Cant Fall A sleep
programme.desc: Duda is hanging his Smoofy blanket to dry. Its been his good friend since he was a baby and he needs it to sleep every night. A strong wind blows Smoofy to Scots hideout and Scot decides to turn him into his cape. When Duda realizes that his Smoofy is gone, he becomes distraught and cannot fall asleep. The friends go butterfly exploring the next day; However, Dudas exhaustion from a restless night ruins his expedition. After discovering Dudas problem, the friends try to help him fall asleep. Soon, Scot shows up with a sleep-inducing invention, and inadvertently reunites Doubt with his precious Smoofy. But Scot wont give up Smoofy without a fight.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: Kites Away!
programme.desc: It all happens for a kite! Don wants it… the rats wont let it go. And in this tug of war, an angry and frustrated King Chomp is funnily pulled into. It is a bad time for the rats and a very bad time for Don and Colonel.

programme.title: The Princess's Party
programme.desc: Aladdin and Jamillah really want to go to the big party that the Princess is holding in the palace gardens but they dont even have an invitation, let alone anything to wear. Genie is convinced he can sneak them in, so he conjures up some great party threads but warns them that they will only last until sunset and they must be back before then or the clothes will disappear! The party is great fun until Aladdin gets carried away pretending to be visiting royalty and forgets the deadline leaving them exposed to the anger of the Grand Vizier. They try to make a run for it but he catches them and its only Genie swooping in at the last minute that saves them.

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: Trolly Troll arrives in Smightyland, but her big size scares everyone except Leila. Leila befriends the gentle giant and when Sneevil creates his Mecha-Sneevil Machine and tries to destroy everything, its Trolly Trolls "bigness" that helps save the day.

programme.title: Even More Difficult – The Beauty & The Best
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the tale of Beauty and the Beast, having been called out by BEAUTY. The BEAST has mysteriously disappeared, just when she had come to love him. The Detective and her assistant must find him before the magic rose in the garden loses its last petal.

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.desc: Tras pasar siete años en la cárcel por asesinato, Dina logra demostrar su inocencia y obtener su libertad.

programme.title: SuperDad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Jack y Jill 3
programme.desc: 10 años después de los últimos asesinatos atroces en la colina, Jack y Jill están de regreso para masacrar al elenco y al equipo de un programa de Internet en vivo que busca descubrir los secretos de la leyenda...

programme.title: El Demonio Interior
programme.desc: Años después de salir de la cárcel, Sam Parsons intenta rehacer su vida con su mujer Courtney y su hija Harper. Trabaja duro para mantener a su familia y permitirse una bonita casa en su tranquilo barrio de las afueras. Cuando empiezan a ocurrir sucesos sobrenaturales en la casa, Sam teme por la seguridad de su mujer y su hija. Cuando los sucesos se convierten en ataques, Sam contrata a Corbin Carlysle y a su equipo de cazafantasmas conocido como «The Ghost Killers», para que le ayuden a luchar contra la entidad oscura que acecha en las sombras de su casa. Cuando las cosas empiezan a complicarse y queda claro que esta entidad es mucho más peligrosa que el típico fantasma, surgen complicaciones cuando Corbin y su equipo se centran más en la fama y la fortuna. Para ganar esta lucha Sam debe luchar contra sus propios demonios interiores y volver a su violento pasado. Para salvar a sus seres queridos, un Demonio debe enfrentarse a un Demonio.

programme.title: Portal de Monstruos de H.P. Lovecraft
programme.desc: Una secta está a punto de despertar a la criatura más temida de H.P. Lovecraft...

Corre el año 2097 que después de 30 años de paz y prosperidad se ha erradicado la letal pandemia del virus del 2067.Pero una sombra se cierne sobre las comunidades de supervivientes. Un espectro que vuelve para atormentar a aquellos que desterraron la causa de la pandemia logrando retornar a la supervivencia necesaria para sobrevivir a pesar de la lección sufrida por la humanidad desde el 2067

programme.title: Epitafio
programme.desc: En 1519, antes de llegar a la capital azteca México-Tenochtitlán, tres conquistadores españoles marchan hacia la cima del volcán Popocatépetl, de más de 5400 metros de altura. El ascenso es complicado, deben enfrentar la fuerza de la naturaleza y el temor a lo desconocido, pero su misión es de gran importancia para los intereses del ejército de Hernán Cortés

programme.title: Faraday
programme.desc: Faraday es un telépata especialista en fenómenos paranormales. Su novia, Pati, es una bloguera entregada a los cupcakes cuya máxima aspiración en la vida es ser famosa en internet. Alquilan un piso muy barato en el que al fin podrán independizarse, pero una vez instalados descubren que está encantado. “Faraday” es una historia de amor que supera todas las fronteras, incluidas las del Más Allá. Una comedia paranormal que tocará la fibra a todos aquellos que alguna vez han deseado ser “modernos”

programme.title: Escape En Vivo
programme.desc: Un investigador paranormal descubre una tierra de nadie infernal en un remoto y olvidado paisaje desértico donde payasos malvados esperan en un purgatorio sobrenatural para enfrentar su destino como venganza por sus malas acciones.

programme.title: Reto Sangriento
programme.desc: Dos jóvenes investigadores de fenómenos paranormales reciben el reto de pasar un fin de semana en una casa donde habitan seres malignos. Esto con el fin de presentar las evidencias en su programa de televisión y levantar el rating, pero lo que no saben es que el reto les costara muy caro.

programme.title: El Beso Inmortal: La Reina De La Noche
programme.desc: Las vacaciones italianas de dos universitarias chocan con un antiguo ritual. Pero a veces los rezos se convierten en cazadores.

programme.title: I'm Not Stuck Unless I Stop
programme.desc: In “I’m Not Stuck Unless I Stop,” Pastor Steven unpacks the first mindset of his latest book, “Do The New You,” to teach us how to keep praising God before we see the victory.

programme.title: Christ Is In Me. I Am Enough.
programme.desc: I am enough because Christ is in me. Pastors Steven and Holly Furtick join forces to discuss breaking free of the trap of self-doubt and stepping confidently into our identity as children of God.

programme.title: WIth God There's Always A Way, And By Faith I Will Find It
programme.desc: In “With God There’s Always A Way, And By Faith I Will Find It,” Pastor Rich Wilkerson reminds us that our prayers might not be answered when or how we expect, but with God they will be better than we could have imagined.

programme.title: Rags To Righteous
programme.desc: There’s more God wants to do through you. In “Rags to Righteous!” Pastor Steven Furtick explains that God has a plan for every pit stop on the way to your purpose.
